skills.name: calm
skills.msgOff: You have lost your peace of mind.

skills.name: detect evil
skills.msgOff: The red in your vision disappears.

skills.name: detect good
skills.msgOff: The gold in your vision disappears.

skills.name: detect hidden
skills.msgOff: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

skills.name: detect invis
skills.msgOff: You no longer see invisible objects.

skills.name: faerie fire
skills.msgOff: The pink aura around you fades away.

skills.name: fly
skills.msgOff: You slowly float to the ground.

skills.name: infravision
skills.msgOff: You no longer see in the dark.

skills.name: sanctuary
skills.msgOff: The white aura around your body fades.

skills.name: shield
skills.msgOff: Your force shield shimmers then fades away.

skills.name: berserk
skills.msgOff: You feel your pulse slow down.

skills.name: dirt kicking
skills.msgOff: You rub the dirt out of your eyes.
